meanings.definition: To put away in a safe or convenient place.
meanings.sent1: She stows her favorite toys in the toy chest.
meanings.sent2: He always stows his keys in the top drawer.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel stows away nuts for the winter.
meanings.sent4: She stows her memories in a special box in her heart.
meanings.sent5: He stows his dreams in the quiet corners of his mind.

meanings.definition: To pack or store in a specified place.
meanings.sent1: He stows his clothes neatly in the suitcase.
meanings.sent2: She stows the groceries in the pantry after shopping.
meanings.sent3: The magician stows away surprises in his hat.
meanings.sent4: She stows her love in every carefully wrapped gift.
meanings.sent5: He stows his worries in the hidden compartments of his bag.

meanings.definition: To cram or squeeze into a small space.
meanings.sent1: She stows her books tightly on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: He stows the last few items in the already full backpack.
meanings.sent3: The clown stows himself into a tiny car for the show.
meanings.sent4: She stows her laughter in her infectious smile.
meanings.sent5: He stows his determination in his compact frame.
